channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 23:19 Air alarm to the Kiev region follow the following messages.
item.description: 🔴 23:19 Air alarm to the Kiev region follow the following messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 23:08 Drawing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Manganese and Marganets Territorial Community, Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 23:08 Drawing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
